description: Make the Cut! is prominently used by scrapbookers who want to create their own custom shapes. The software works with several cutting machines including Klic-N-Kut models, BossKut Gazelle, and CraftWell's eCraft.
NOTE: The MTC file can be exported to other formats, such as .SVG , .EPS , .JPG , .PNG , and .PDF using Make the Cut!
